column4: heading out of town and trying to configure remote desktop.  everything works but i still have to hit accept on desktop for session to begin.  i have enabled UPnP on router but still can't login.  is there a way around this?  what am i missing?
i had the same issue. I ended up using vncserver
i just want to be able to grab files and throw into dropbox or something if i need it while i'm gone
